mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jwf_legacy ( Parameters, Mode_, State, EventTime, ErrorMessage, ErrorStackTrace, ErrorClass, DeleteTime ) VALUES ( #{parameters}, #{mode}, #{state}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss.FF3'), #{errorMessage}, #{errorStackTrace}, #{errorClass}, #{deleteTime} )

INSERT INTO jwf_legacy ( Parameters, Mode_, State, EventTime, ErrorMessage, ErrorStackTrace, ErrorClass, DeleteTime, FormInstID, ProcessID, FormPrefix, DocNumber, ApproverId, ApvMode, FormInfoExt, ApprovalContext ) VALUES ( #{parameters}, #{mode}, #{state}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss.FF3'), #{errorMessage}, #{errorStackTrace}, #{errorClass}, #{deleteTime}, #{FormInstID}, #{ProcessID}, #{FormPrefix}, #{DocNumber}, #{ApproverId}, #{ApvMode}, #{FormInfoExt}, #{ApprovalContext} )
mapper.select:
SELECT LegacyID AS "LegacyID", FormInstID AS "FormInstID", Parameters AS "Parameters", Mode_ AS "Mode", State AS "State", EventTime AS "EventTime", ErrorMessage AS "ErrorMessage", ErrorStackTrace AS "ErrorStackTrace", ErrorClass AS "ErrorClass", DeleteTime AS "DeleteTime", ProcessID AS "ProcessID", ApvMode AS "ApvMode", ApproverId AS "ApproverId", DocNumber AS "DocNumber", Subject AS "Subject", InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName", FormName AS "FormName", ProcessState AS "ProcessState", BusinessData1 AS "BusinessData1", BusinessData1 AS "BusinessData2", LastRetryTime AS "LastRetryTime" FROM ( SELECT a.LegacyID, a.FormInstID, a.Parameters, a.Mode_, a.State, a.EventTime, a.ErrorMessage, a.ErrorStackTrace, a.ErrorClass, a.DeleteTime, NVL(a.ProcessID,(SELECT f.ProcessID FROM jwf_forminstance f WHERE a.FormInstID = f.FormInstID AND f.FormInstID IS NOT null)) ProcessID, a.ApvMode, a.ApproverId, a.DocNumber, b.Subject, b.InitiatorName, c.FormName, (SELECT p.ProcessState FROM jwf_process p WHERE p.FormInstID = a.FormInstID AND p.ProcessID = b.ProcessID) ProcessState, (SELECT BusinessData1 FROM jwf_processdescription WHERE FormInstID = a.FormInstID AND ROWNUM = 1) BusinessData1, (SELECT BusinessData2 FROM jwf_processdescription WHERE FormInstID = a.FormInstID AND ROWNUM = 1) BusinessData2, a.LastRetryTime FROM jwf_legacy a LEFT OUTER JOIN jwf_forminstance b ON a.FormInstID = b.FormInstID LEFT OUTER JOIN jwf_forms c ON b.FormID = c.FormID WHERE 1=1 AND a.DeleteTime IS NULL AND a.Mode_ = #{searchMode}
AND a.State = #{searchState}
AND a.EventTime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(to_Date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'0')+1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND
b.Subject b.InitiatorName c.FormName a.DocNumber a.FormInstID
like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%'
AND ( a.FormInstID = #{icoSearch} OR b.Subject LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR b.InitiatorName LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR c.FormName LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR a.DocNumber LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' )
AND EXISTS ( select 'x' from jwf_forminstance fi where fi.forminstid = A.forminstid and fi.entcode = #{EntCode} )
) LegacyErrorList
LegacyID FormInstID ProcessID ApvMode DocNumber EventTime FormName Subject InitiatorName LegacyID
ASC DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_legacy a LEFT OUTER JOIN jwf_forminstance b ON a.FormInstID = b.FormInstID LEFT OUTER JOIN jwf_forms c ON b.FormID = c.FormID WHERE 1=1 AND DeleteTime IS NULL AND a.Mode_ = #{searchMode}
AND a.State = #{searchState}
AND a.EventTime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(to_Date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'0')+1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND
b.Subject b.InitiatorName c.FormName a.DocNumber a.FormInstID
like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%'
AND ( a.FormInstID = #{icoSearch} OR b.Subject LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR b.InitiatorName LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR c.FormName LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR a.DocNumber LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOV_RECORD_DOC_TEMP ( FormInstID, ProcessID, DeptCode, RegistCheck, RecordClassNum, RecordSubject, Address, SpecialRecord, ReleaseCheck, ReleaseRestriction, KeepPeriod, SecureLevel ) SELECT MS.MULTI_FORM_INST_ID, JP.PROCESSID , JW.USERCODE, MULTI_REGIST_CHECK, MULTI_RECORD_CLASS_NUM, MULTI_RECORD_SUBJECT, MULTI_ADDRESS, MULTI_SPECIAL_RECORD, MULTI_RELEASE_CHECK, MULTI_RELEASE_RESTRICTION, MULTI_KEEP_PERIOD, MULTI_SECURE_LEVEL FROM HWP_MULTI_GOV_SUB MS LEFT JOIN JWF_PROCESS JP ON JP.FORMINSTID = MS.MULTI_FORM_INST_ID LEFT JOIN JWF_WORKITEM JW ON JP.PROCESSID = JW.PROCESSID WHERE MS.MULTI_FORM_INST_ID = #{FormInstID}
mapper.select: select LegacyHistoryID AS "LegacyHistoryID" ,ApvMode AS "ApvMode" ,IfType AS "IfType" ,LegacyInfo AS "LegacyInfo" ,Parameters AS "Parameters" ,ActionValue AS "ActionValue" ,LegacyKey AS "LegacyKey" ,State AS "State" ,ErrorStackTrace AS "ErrorStackTrace" ,RawResponse AS "RawResponse" ,ResultCode AS "ResultCode" ,ResultMessage AS "ResultMessage" ,FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix" ,FormInstID AS "FormInstID" ,ProcessID AS "ProcessID" ,UserCode AS "UserCode" ,Subject AS "Subject" ,EventStartTime AS "EventStartTime" ,EventEndTime AS "EventEndTime" ,ElapsedTime AS "ElapsedTime" ,LegacyConfigID AS "LegacyConfigID" ,RegistDate AS "RegistDate" from gwuser.jwf_legacy_if_history where LegacyHistoryID = #{LegacyHistoryID}

SELECT LegacyHistoryID AS "LegacyHistoryID", ApvMode AS "ApvMode", IfType AS "IfType", LegacyInfo AS "LegacyInfo", Parameters AS "Parameters", ActionValue AS "ActionValue", LegacyKey AS "LegacyKey", State AS "State", ErrorStackTrace AS "ErrorStackTrace", RawResponse AS "RawResponse", ResultCode AS "ResultCode", ResultMessage AS "ResultMessage", FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix", FormInstID AS "FormInstID", ProcessID AS "ProcessID", UserCode AS "UserCode", Subject AS "Subject", EventStartTime AS "EventStartTime", EventEndTime AS "EventEndTime", ElapsedTime AS "ElapsedTime", LegacyConfigID AS "LegacyConfigID", RegistDate AS "RegistDate", DeleteDate AS "DeleteDate", LastRetryTime AS "LastRetryTime", Seq AS "Seq", ProgramName AS "ProgramName", DocNo AS "DocNo", InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName", FormName AS "FormName", ProcessState AS "ProcessState", BusinessData1 AS "BusinessData1", BusinessData2 AS "BusinessData2" FROM ( SELECT ih.LegacyHistoryID, ih.ApvMode, ih.IfType, ih.LegacyInfo, ih.Parameters, ih.ActionValue, ih.LegacyKey, ih.State, ih.ErrorStackTrace, ih.RawResponse, ih.ResultCode, ih.ResultMessage, ih.FormPrefix, ih.FormInstID, NVL(ih.ProcessID,b.ProcessID) ProcessID, ih.UserCode, ih.Subject, ih.EventStartTime, ih.EventEndTime, ih.ElapsedTime, ih.LegacyConfigID, ih.RegistDate, ih.DeleteDate, ih.LastRetryTime, ic.Seq, ic.ProgramName, b.DocNo, b.InitiatorName, c.FormName, p.ProcessState, pd.BusinessData1, pd.BusinessData2 FROM gwuser.jwf_legacy_if_history ih LEFT OUTER join gwuser.jwf_legacy_if_config ic on ih.LegacyConfigID = ic.LegacyConfigID JOIN gwuser.jwf_forminstance b ON ih.FormInstID = b.FormInstID
AND b.EntCode = #{EntCode}
LEFT OUTER JOIN gwuser.jwf_forms c ON b.FormID = c.FormID LEFT OUTER JOIN gwuser.jwf_process p ON p.ProcessID = b.ProcessID LEFT OUTER join gwuser.jwf_processdescription pd on pd.ProcessDescriptionID = p.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE 1=1 AND ih.DeleteDate IS NULL
AND ih.State = #{searchState}
AND ih.RegistDate BETWEEN to_Date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_Date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1
AND
ih.ApvMode ic.ProgramName c.FormName ih.Subject b.InitiatorName b.DocNo ih.forminstid
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND ( ic.ProgramName = #{icoSearch} OR c.FormName LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR ih.Subject LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR b.InitiatorName LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR b.DocNo LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' OR ih.forminstid LIKE '%' || #{icoSearch} || '%' )
) LegacyErrorList
ApvMode Seq IfType ProgramName FormInstID ProcessID FormName Subject InitiatorName DocNo RegistDate State LegacyHistoryID
ASC DESC
